  • Latest review: I, Tonya - Dear Sarah Kawahara, Skating Choreographer

The Best of 2017

Six different critics, six different films - which one is really the best film of 2017? You tell us. The only consensus we can reach is that this was a pretty great year for film. But if there's a particular cri de coeur here that speak to you, we'd love to hear about it.

By Dear Cast & Crew

Mailed on February 23, 2018

I, Tonya

Dear Sarah Kawahara,
Skating Choreographer

By Tim McEown

Black Panther

Dear Moviegoers,
Change Agents

By Ankit Verma

Molly's Game

Dear Josh Leichner,
Technical Advisor

By Di Golding

Downsizing

Dear Ann-Marie Ferney-Tellez,
Props Buyer

By Christopher Redmond

Raw is Unhinged and the Best Film of 2017

By Ankit Verma

Ankit Verma explains why he can't even explain why Raw topped his list this year.

Call Me By Your Name

Dear Valerio Rapisarda,
Runner

By Di Golding

Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle

Dear Owen Paterson,
Production Designer

By Tim McEown

All the Money in the World

Dear Michelle Williams,
Actress

By Nat Master

The Shape of Water

Dear Kerry Hayes,
Still Photographer

By Tim McEown
